Contributing
============

All development of *FlashKit* happens on `Github <https://github.com/GWU-CFD/FlashKit>`_.

If you find bugs or have questions or suggestions, please open an `issue <https://github.com/GWU-CFD/FlashKit/issues/>`_ on Github.

| Fixes and new features are welcome in the form of a `pull request <https://github.com/GWU-CFD/FlashKit/pulls/>`_.
| Please read the discussion about :ref:`adding new features <Adding New Features>` before contributing a pull request.
|

If and when *FlashKit* gains any significant number of additional contributors,
a code of conduct will be included; until then, just be nice.
